verbs.description: [ARG0: sunny peppery pasta] [V: has] [ARG1: only 5 ingredients] but so much flavor add some oomph to plain pasta with black pepper chili flakes and fresh herbs sunny
sunny peppery pasta has only 5 ingredients but [ARG0: so much flavor] [V: add] [ARG1: some oomph] [ARG2: to plain pasta with black pepper chili flakes and fresh herbs sunny]
